website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for L'Occitane lovers who want the brand's impressive moisturizing benefits without spending a lot of money on a small portion.
pros: pump bottle goes a long way when it comes to moisturizing dry hands
Fans rave about the lavender scent
cons: Not quite as thick as other hand creams by the brand, but this characteristic doesn't seem to having any bearing on its effectiveness at moisturizing dry skin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Horrible Packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about how my wife loves this product - one of the best skin products going. But when she gets about halfway down, the product refuses to come out through the pump. It's either a problem with the pump or a problem with the lotion, but it ends up costing twice as much since it's all but impossible to use the second half! Not buying this again. Readers will note that this is my first one-star rating....
customer_reviews.author: SabreSailor

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, clean and fresh sent
customer_reviews.text: They only issues I have with this is when the product gets low, around the bottom 1/4 of container, the pump no longer picks up and pumps out the lotion. Not good for such a premium and expensive product. I have purchased these many times as the product inside is great, just unfortunately hard to get your full money's worth. you have to work at it and tap and bang on the counter to get all of it out. Pump needs to be better and or solved to work more fully. You will like this lotion, feels great on your skin, smells clean and fresh
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Ideal viscosity
customer_reviews.text: The viscosity is ideal. Not an overpowering scent but it smells good when I get a whiff of it. Absorbs well into my skin and lasts for a good 4-6 hours depending on how many times I wash my hands. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Renn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase, the texture is perfect, moisturizing but not greasy. If you like the sent of lavender, as in the plant, this is the closest I've found. The sent starts strong, which is great right before bed, but fades quickly so that not everyone around you can smell it. LOVE THIS LOTION
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: I got hooked on L'Occitane products traveling around Europe a lot and love being able to purchase on Amazon when I'm in the US. Their products are not cheap but are quality and you use a lot less. This has a silky feel and a mild but lovely scent. Prices are comparable to duty free shopping if you have Prime. I buy for me but purchasing a few prodcuts would be a great gift. When you can go to the store they have select promotions, but until then, buy them here!
customer_reviews.author: OutAndAbout

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lotion. Way over and above drug store lotions, and although it’s more expensive you are definitely getting a much better product. It soaks in to your hands leaving them super soft, not greasy at all. The scent is a lovely, soft lavender that lightly lingers. Highly recommend! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: BSG

customer_reviews.title: pump doesn't work well when half is gone.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottle, it's a square shape...I like that. It's smells wonderful. It is a good product. On the negative side, when half gone I have to take off the screw on pump because it won't come out of the pump at this point, so the convenience of the pump is gone. It is quite expensive too. Because of this I won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Chase

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most LUXURIOUS and divine lotion. I bought it as a gift and kept it (nice friend, eh?). The lavender essence is just marvelous--not sickeningly perfumey. It's one of those products that you love so much, you keep smelling yourself, it's so nice. This product, like ALL of L'Occitane products, are rich and makes your skin feel sumptuous.
customer_reviews.author: Walden

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: Probably overpriced for what it is -- I've made my own hand cream when I've had the time, no less good than this -- but I wanted a squat pump bottle for my bedside table (nothing tall and tippy), with a good-quality cream, and I knew that L'Occitane would not disappoint. The lotion has a lovely scent, which to my mind suggests tangerine essence (I grow tangerines in my garden), but the label says 'Verbena': fine. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: transponder

customer_reviews.title: Lavender smell is a little intense
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend always says I smell like an old lady when I use lavender... and this is the same. I was hoping it would be subtle, but it's more intense than I thought. Feels good, just smell is over powering. I prefer the regular one, will go back to that next time.
customer_reviews.author: A student

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it was possible to have too heavy a lavender fragrance but this product hs one powerful scent. Like others from this company the quality is high. It's light, creamy and works. Will probably buy same product, different scent.
customer_reviews.author: Samorana

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant. Not a Lavender fragrance at all, more pungent, for men.
customer_reviews.text: Although the lotion is moisturizing, the smell is awful. At best it smells like a men's fragrance, but more like diluted Off insect repellent. It has very little lavender fragrance. My wife found it hard to remove the smell from her hands after washing several times.
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: Addictive!
customer_reviews.text: I love their hand lotions. This one I didn't even try before buying on Amazon, but I knew it would be great. It has such a nice scent. It's a nice Lavender smell, but then easily settles into a sweeter vanilla or Shea scent too. Love the size. The shape is cute, IMO, a chunky rectangle/ square. I leave this by my chair in the living room. Friends love using it when they see it. Will buy more! Oh, and shipping is amazing, as usual.
customer_reviews.author: T. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Good product; good price at $20; nice fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I've used many O'Occitane products. They never disappoint, but they can be pricey. This one, at $20, is a great deal. 10 oz doesn't sound like a lot, but it lasts a long time. The fragrance is light and pleasant. If you need something for ultra dry skin, this isn't what you're looking for, but if you want a lightweight, greaseless hand lotion with a pleasing scent, you'll like this one.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love using this at bedtime.
customer_reviews.text: I love the L'Occitaine brand and use many of their products. I like to use this one at bedtime. I find the lavender very relaxing and the lotion is very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Light airy aroma
customer_reviews.text: I love to go to the ritz Carlton bathroom soaps and this is my favorite lotion to pamper myself. It isn’t thick and has a light clean aroma that’s very calming.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent product! Lovely light lavender scent with no chemical smell, moisturizes well.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful hand cream, not greasy and absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.text: The lavender scent isn't overpowering and the cream is perfect for replenishing the moisture in dry hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: tallahasseelass

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift and unfortunately the bottle came damaged and “Un-giftable”. So unfortunate when you spend this money and then it arrives damaged 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I have bought repeatedly for myself and for gifts. If you like the fragrance, this will be very special as a gift or for oneself. It is a bit on the pricey side but lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Syringa

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmm....
customer_reviews.text: Nothing smells better. I love the fresh, bright, clean, citrus of this lotion. Nobody does verbena like l'Occitane!
customer_reviews.author: rh

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous lavender moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Great fragrance of lavender and cream contains rich emollients. Quite moisturizing. Great anytime.
customer_reviews.author: D. Freitag

customer_reviews.title: Best hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of hand creams and this is the best I’ve found. It’s great on my body too
customer_reviews.author: Shergie

customer_reviews.title: Package was damaged, not caused by shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone and the package was damaged. It wasn't caused by the shipping either.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: I always love their products but now that I'm in the high desert I wondered how this would work and it does!! And of course the lavender scent never disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and very similar to the same product sold in a tube.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.N.

customer_reviews.title: I ❤️This
customer_reviews.text: I adore this. The scent is fabulous and the cream is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Williams

customer_reviews.title: 'She who must be obeyed' loves this item.
customer_reviews.text: Use at night. The lavender relaxes you and brings sleep to you easier.
customer_reviews.author: David Timme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hand cream I have used in a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs quickly, not greasy and smells like fresh lemony fruit.
customer_reviews.text: Product was early and is all i hoped it would be. It smells so awesome and absorbs quickly. You don’t have to use a lot and it’s not greasy but makes your skin so soft. I love this lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Hart

customer_reviews.title: Did not seem to be an authentic L'Occitane Product
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe this is an authentic L'Occitane product. I usually buy L'Occitane products at one of their stores or from their website, but I was in a rush and wanted the quick shipping. But this lotion, from the container to its contents, was fishy to me -- the cream is cheap and the smell is not the same as the other lavender products from L'Occitane I have used in the past. Buyer beware -- I think this is a fake! I returned this and will not purchase this kind of product through Amazon again -- I am a big Amazon fan, but there should be more careful quality control, esp. when it comes to brands like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products
customer_reviews.text: I love everything from L’occitane. Products from France 🇫🇷, excellent. My father’s half of French mixed. When I visited Paris few years ago, I bought a lot of l’occitane products, took home . My skin is smooth, healthy and moist since I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Bach L. Anong

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good lotion and has a good scent
customer_reviews.text: I use this stuff as an aftershave. It is a very good lotion and has a good scent. I may have to take out the pump to get the last bit out of the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Vi  Power

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law loves lotion. It smells great as well as moisturizers your hands.
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: A little touch of luxury goes a long way to feeling better.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Polosky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the usual L'Occitane reputation -- wonderful scent and very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: humpty dumpty

customer_reviews.title: I buy it for the clean lavender frangrance
customer_reviews.text: L'Occitane has the best lavender scent of any product I've ever purchased. This lotion is not as rich as the L'Occitane hand cream I usually buy but it is less expensive as well. Glad I bought it..
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Bain

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as Christmas Gift. I love the Brand and this is inexpensive to give away. Works good and my friend order a few thing for herself afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Emma P.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The lavender fragrance doesn't last the way the lotion I had bought from the L'Occitane website.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny B

customer_reviews.title: Yummy smell
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells heavenly and I can't imagine anyone who says they don't like it. It's creamy and smooth and I want to use it all the time. Someone told me that "men don't like lavender". I beg to differ....men love the way my hands smell.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: L’occitane lotions are my favorite. The scent is always perfect and not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: L’occitane lotions are my favorite. The scent is always perfect and not overpowering. I use that hand and feet ones and love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second bottle
customer_reviews.text: I received my first bottle of this lotion as a gift and loved its lemony scent, perfect texture (neither too slippery nor too thick), and easy-to-use pump so much that when I used it all up, I purchased one myself. The only negative is that the price is high, but I bit the bullet and ordered it anyway because it was my favorite lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and Tracy

customer_reviews.title: 98-year-old woman approves
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I purchased this for our 98-year-old mother who is in a nursing home. We try to make sure she has little niceties This did indeed fill the bill. Mother uses it every day and loves the delicate lavender scent. A definite recommend for one's self or a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love this lotion.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice lavedar lotion. I use it every night before going to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jill of all trades

customer_reviews.title: Lasting softness
customer_reviews.text: Great hand lotion for a great price. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like plastic
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't smell anything like the same lotion I've tried in the store. It left my hands smelling like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Soft handcream
customer_reviews.text: One of the best hand creams - goes with the soap I have ain our guest bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you love real lavender, this is the perfect hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love L'Occitane lavender products, and this lotion is perfect. Not slimy, absorbs well and quickly, and my dry hands feel great after I use it. The lotion smells just like real lavender - it's fresh, not cloying and too sweet as so many other lavender products from other companies are. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Love Lemon Verbena
customer_reviews.text: Lovely hand lotion with the perfume of Lemon Verbena. I wish it wasn’t so expensive, but it’s L’Occitane brand ...
customer_reviews.author: Donna T

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Just love the smell, so fresh. Quick absorbing hand lotion too.
customer_reviews.author: Smrtyoz

customer_reviews.title: Only pros are it smells good and pump type
customer_reviews.text: this is a hand lotion. Not a cream. Wont work as half of original shear butter hand cream. Only pros are it smells good and pump type.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my mother as a gift . She absolutely loves this stuff
customer_reviews.author: stephhhhhhhhie

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found this lotion. It's just right for my hands, and has a bit of a citrus smell.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect level of scent and it the perfect level are moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. It moisturizes but it’s not This product is excellent. It moisturizes but it’s not greasy. The smell is on a level fiveIt is not too overbearing to wear in an elevator.
customer_reviews.author: Torts

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love L'Occitane products, especially anything they make in Lavender scent. I keep this by my bed and apply to my hands and feet before bedtime. The smell is soothing and I wake up 8 hours later with still moisturized hands and feet. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Authentic lavendar aroma
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered this product numerous times. I use it as a hand lotion every night before I go to bed. The lavender aroma is very soothing; not perfume-y at all. It is a little pricey but I regard this as my special treat!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great none greasy, pleasantly smellIng
customer_reviews.text: Great none greasy, pleasantly smellIng, hand lotion! Perfect for my powder room.
customer_reviews.author: Vika

customer_reviews.title: The delicate fragrance pulled me in, but the smoothing ...
customer_reviews.text: The delicate fragrance pulled me in, but the smoothing job L'Occitane did on my hands keeps me coming back.
customer_reviews.author: K. Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Luxury for my hands
customer_reviews.text: My hands feel better, and I really like the scent of Verbena, have for years. It is rich and absorbs well, no greasy feeling. L'Occitane products are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CeciLafayette

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite along with shower gel and perfume. Lasting fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wyrick

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this lotion is just fantastic, I do feel like I have to put it on frequently because it is not the best in the moisturizing department.
customer_reviews.author: amendi09

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite!! Smells wonderful and feels so silky.
customer_reviews.author: A.  Jost

customer_reviews.title: awesome prodact
customer_reviews.text: smell nice and moisturizing just perfect ..... have that lotion in every bathroom and at work as well
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I found my Dream Cream!!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally looked for 20 years for the perfect hand cream, only to purchase the cheapest to the most expensive finding fault with all of them. I felt like the bears in Goldilocks, "too oily, too heavy, too smelly...too watery!" I received a sample of this cream in a package one time and I tried it, and squeezed it dry, got online with Amazon, and placed my first of many orders! I found my Dream Cream!! Wonderful product, light pleasant fragrant, with just the right feel! A little expensive, but it's worth it, to the final drop!
customer_reviews.author: Sue V.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted by how great this lotion is! Silky. Absorbs nicely. And smells heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Stephanie Jourdan

customer_reviews.title: Divine experience.
customer_reviews.text: It may be an expense, but it is a divine experience as well.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious fragrance! Not excellent on moisturizing, but certainly leaves a very clean, fresh smell. Love this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand lotion. It makes your hands feel really nice and smooth and the lavender smell is just wonderful and very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Omaelli

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful hand lotion with the distinctive verbena fragrance. As well as smelling divine, the lotion moisturizes without leaving a greasy feeling on your hands. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hester V

customer_reviews.title: Four Seasons
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this lotion while staying at the Four Seasons. Love the crisp scent and it isn't greasy. Reminds me of my trip when I use it! Best lotion ever!
customer_reviews.author: J. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lotion
customer_reviews.text: Light sent and doesn't feel oil. Part of my nightly routine. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love L'Occitane soap. The lotion smells nice but is not very moisturizing. 30 minutes after use my hands are dry.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Cheaper than retail. Would like for it to keep moisturizing longer.
customer_reviews.author: tvaughn

customer_reviews.title: It moisturizes dry hands
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell and the fact that it’s not greasy and moisturizes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these products - must be the shea butter that makes it so soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Judith W. Springer

customer_reviews.title: This moisturizer smells amazing, lightly lavender scented
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer smells amazing, lightly lavender scented, not overwhelming. also it leaves the skin soft and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KC_Review

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this product form L'Occitane. I wears every night before go to bed, it's great for relax.
customer_reviews.author: JAA

customer_reviews.title: there paint size ones were super expensive and one could be used up in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I only use L 'Occitane hand cream, however, there paint size ones were super expensive and one could be used up in a week. This size is perfect and I have been used it for almost half year!
customer_reviews.author: sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Best smell but better hand creams out there
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. Probably most natural intense smelling lavender lotion unsurpassed for aromatherapy (very relaxing) however it loses a star because it is a bit thin and wish it were more creamy maybe add shea butter or something. Love this pump version! Makes great gift. A bit expensive but worth it as I haven't found a nicer smelling one. UPDATE --The pump tube doesn't reach nearly close to the bottom of the jar and for that it loses another star for the inconvenience. Now how am I supposed to get the rest of the lotion out? For the price it is really irritating. The pump just seems gimmicky now and I would rather buy the tube moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: L.Krupa

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats this scent!
customer_reviews.text: There is no Lavender product around that smells as true as L'Occitane Lavande! I surely hope they never discontinue it. Even my husband enjoys the scent and you know how men are! I always have a Lavande Hand Lotion next to the sinks in my home. There is always a tube of lotion in my purse. Besides smelling amazing, the lotion itself is fabulous! It is super moisturizing and leaves no greasiness behind. I prefer to buy this lotion from Amazon, as with Prime i save monty on shipping and gas in my car to drive to the L'Occitane store in the mall. Saving money equals more $$$ to spend on more L'Occitane!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY L NORRBOM

customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is real or expired but it smell different now
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lovely product. The cream is smooth, and absorbs without being greasy. It leaves my hands soft.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth1100

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to buy this as long as it is available. It is perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Lonski

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not as good as the other body lotions from this company
customer_reviews.text: The smell of the lotion is good but somehow not as good as the Yardley's English Lavender soap smell, which I love. Consistency and the moisturizing ability are good.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Compare to the Shea Butter, this is a thin layer hand lotion. I do like the Verbena smell.
customer_reviews.author: mooserelli

customer_reviews.title: Creamy smooth and with a very beautiful fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: Creamy smooth and with a very beautiful fragrance. Worth the price. Will definitely buy more when this bottle runs low.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Lazzarini

customer_reviews.title: hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: this is sure good stuff--I gave it for Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WEIGHT LOTION
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick a cream as I would have preferred but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: D Jones

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter....she used it right after opening it, and she loved it...especially the Lavender!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee from Midwest

customer_reviews.title: this is all we use now
customer_reviews.text: I've used many lotions over the years, but this one has ended up replacing all the others. The scent is heavenly -- not too strong, but still noticeable. And it really works to replace dry skin with softer healthier skin, even only after a few days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Athena R. Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Good scent, thin consistency.
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent but the lotion is thinner than I desired.
customer_reviews.author: J Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this - works better than any other hand lotion.
customer_reviews.author: pg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with this lotion. Smells lovely, isn't greasy, and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: LLB17350

customer_reviews.title: It is not as rich as the hand cream, ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not as rich as the hand cream, but I prefer the lighter texture. one star off for the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Su

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great consistency & smells great! Feel like I'm living at the Four Seasons. :)
customer_reviews.author: Here&There

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd bottle! Yes, it's a bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: *Rock Star*Top Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, texture and scent. I give it as gifts often.
customer_reviews.author: E. P. Sery

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Smooth and creamy not greasy and smells like heaven
customer_reviews.author: Palm Springs Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this lotion! Got it at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Almost the same price as the retail outlets but If you don't have a L'Occitane near just try it. The soap is expensive but it last much longer than regular soap and it gets me feeling clean. Clinical Deodorant it a pain to get off but this brand soap (sensitive or regular) does it very well with no residue. I am not a salesman or compensated in anyway but when I find a product that does what it should and then some I like to share. This scent is a blend of lavender and something that softens the lavender, it is wonderful. It goes great with my shaving kit scent.
customer_reviews.author: robish0

product_meta.title: L'Occitane Moisturizing Hand Lotion,10.1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Scent:LavenderEnriched with the finest lavender from Haute-Provence and Shea Butter to nourish, moisturize and lightly scent the skin. TIPS:Apply a knob of product on clean and dry hands and massage softly to make it penetrate.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
